t: Samsung TV vs Sony TV: which is the best TV brand? | TechRadar
s: May 10, 2022 - However, Sony added an Amazon Alexa Music, Cameras and TV Control app to its more recent TVs, and some mid-range models from previous years. This will let you control third-party smart home products and speakers through some basic Alexa capability – like the Amazon Echo or Ring security cameras – and use Alexa voice commands for the TV's power and volume functions.
